item.title: OSCR Member: Marcelo Malbec De Vidts
item.description: Description Marcelo Malbec De Vidts is a PhD candidate in Experimental Psychopathology at the Department of Psychology, Education and Child Studies at Erasmus University Rotterdam. His research is about how different ways of responding to uncertainty affect individuals. These consequences could be present in cognitive as well as affective domains of human life. To do so, he uses EEG to analyse brain activity in different computer-based scenarios (decision-making; fear processing; error monitoring).
